login_screen.title:
Mettiti alla prova,
 raggiungi i tuoi obiettivi.
login_screen.description:
Crea e sostieni challenge personali, per
 accrescere le tue soft skill da spenderti
 anche nel contesto lavorativo.
challenge_detail_screen.title: Challenge
modal_login.title: Register for free
modal_login.description: Create your free account, get maximum motivation and support from the community and coaches.
register_screen.title: Register
register_screen.sub_title: Register for free with your email and password.
